modName: UKC Uglykidcids CBBE v2 Armor and Clothing Replacers
summary: Adult CBBE v2 & HGEC import Clothing and Armor Replacers
descriptionHtml:
Thank you all for the support and feedback.  This mod is no longer supported as with CK there are now much better mods out there.  I still recommend Killer Keoâ€™s collection if you use CBBE.  If you need to ask me anything send me a direct PM as I do not check this anymore.  

Uglykidcids CBBE v2 Armor and Clothing Replacers

I have authored nothing here.  All of these items are meshes and textures written by others.  I have only redirected them to replace a variety of outfits.  These are all replacers and replace a vanilla article of clothing.  No esp is included.

Required Mods:

Body - Caliente CBBE v2

These are all based on Calientes CBBE v2 body which is required.

http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666

Recommended Mods:

I also recommend CBBE- with Female feet Textures 

http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3685

Which Requires Fem Feet

http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3666

CBBE Female mannequin:
Show off your CBBE outfits with this

http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4164

WIP - Female Daedric Armor Reskin:
This is my favorite armor mod and it\'s not here so you should get it 

http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4081

Killer Keos Skimpy CBBE V2 Armor Set:
I recommend Glass without Shoulders, Nightingale Prime Textures work well with Keo\'s Nightingale Meshes.  Make sure you install Keo\'s first and then overwrite with mine if you want to benefit from the textures I have included.  I use my mod with Killer Keo\'s.

http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3654

Full Body Tattoo for CBBE v2 Females:
This is all about taste but I love this mod. 
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4662

Armor Restyled by newermind43:
I recommend using only the boot meshes and no textures
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4559

Included Mods:

Nocturnal Collection:
Archmage - Nocturnal CBBE v2 with Blue Starry Sky texture - Black Wench Boots
Archmage Hood - Matching Hood with Hair - Shows Circlets
Archmage Hood OPTIONAL - Cleric Hood (if you don\'t like the hood with hair)
Black Arch Mage Boots and Gloves
Fine Clothes 01 and Radiant - CBBE Short Sleeve Lavender - Black Wench Boots
Fine Clothes 01 Variant - CBBE Short Sleeve Light Green - Black Wench Boots
Fine Clothes 02 - CBBE Short Sleeve Red - Black Wench Boots
Fine Clothes 02 Variant - CBBE Short Sleeve Light Blue - Black Wench Boots
Mage Robe - Adept-Apprentice-Novice - Nocturnal CBBE v2 Burgundy and Gold texture - Black Wench Boots
Mage Robes - Expert-Master - Nocturnal CBBE v2 Purple and Gold Texture - Black Wench Boots
Blue Mage Robes - Nocturnal Variant CBBE v2 Blue texture - Black Wench Boots
Necromancer Robes - Nocturnal Variant CBBE v2 Necromancer texture - Black Wench Boots with red laces 
(These robes also effect Robes of... and have a matching hood)
Thalmor Robes - Nocturnal Variant CBBE v2 Latex Fetish Texture 
Warlock Robes (Black Mage) - Nocturnal Variant CBBE v2 Short Sleeve Black and Red Texture - Black Wench Boots with red laces

Cleric Armor Collection:
Ebony Armor - Cleric Armor CBBE Black and Gold
Wolf Armor - Cleric Armor CBBE Black and White ( I tried other colors for the Wolf armor but it makes the companions look out of place. 

Forsworn Collection:
Forsworn Armor - CBBE v2 Skimpy Snow Leopard (male and boots and gloves are Snow Leopard)
Steel Light Armor - CBBE v2 Skimpy Black
(I did this because the steel sucked bad, even the skimpy ones, and both Lydia and Jordis are permastuck wearing this underneath. I figured I would give them something better to look at. Helmets do not match whatsoever which should be interesting)

Wench-Tavern Collection:
Wench Outfit - CBBE Light Purple Skimpy Tavern Dress (this includes the necessary Boot Textures for the other outfits)
Ysolda Outfit (farmclothes04) - CBBE Dark Purple Skimpy Tavern Dress 
Farmclothes 04 Variant - CBBE Danariel Light Blue 

Barmaids:
Barmaid Clothes - CBBE v2 Short Skimpy Blue with no towel and Black Wench Boots
Barmaid Clothes Variant - CBBE v2 Short Skimpy Purple with no towel and Black Wench Boots
Farm Clothes 01 - CBBE v2 Short Skimpy Barmaid Hot Pink with no towel and Black Wench Boots
Farm Clothes 02 - CBBE v2 Short Skimpy Barmaid Blue with no towel and Black Wench Boots
Farm Clothes 02 Variant - CBBE v2 Short Skimpy Barmaid Blur Textured with no towel and Black Wench Boots
Farm Clothes 03 - CBBE v2 Short Skimpy Barmaid Red with no towel and Black Wench Boots
Farm Clothes 03 Variant - CBBE v2 Short Skimpy Barmaid Red textured with no towel and Black Wench Boots

Dark Brother Hood Shroud Armor:
CBBE v2 Keo Corset with Apocalyptic Girl Shiny Dark Purple textures

Dragon Scale Armor :
Bunny Dragonscale Armor CBBE
Optional Eisen replacer for Dragon Plate Armor  in Black and Dragon Scale Armor in White

Jester Outfit:
Masquerade Jester Outfit Male and Female
Optional Jester Outfit for female: Mixed Armor (Skin will only match on lightest setting)

Wedding Dress:
Ashara Romantic Outfit for CBBE - White Long Dress and Boots
Optional Wedding Dress - Nocturnal CBBE Transparent Short Texture - no shoe replacer

Triss Collection:
Cleric Hood was used to replace the hood on the Thieves Guild Armors for compatibility reasons.  Otherwise you\'ll  just get a bald head.
Thieves Guild Armor - Triss Darker Brown Edition
Thieves Guild Headmaster Armor - Triss Black Edition
Thieves Guild Armor Variant - Triss Redish Brown Edition
Merchant Outfit - Triss Green Version (no gloves and original hat)

Underwear Armor Collection:
Ebony Mail Cuirass - CBBE v2 Dovahkiin Black Bikini 
Steel Armor Cuirass - CBBE v2 Chain mail Bikini
Bandit Cuirass 01 - CBBE v2 Dovahkiin Snow Leopard Bikini
Bandit Cuirass 02 - CBBE v2 Dovahkiin Leopard Bikini
Bandit Cuirass 03 - CBBE v2 White Bear Fur Bikini
Beggar Clothes - CBBE v2 White N\' Dirty Bikini 
Prisoner Clothes - CBBE v2 Never Nude Bikini

Ysolda Nocturnal Collection
I was not so big a fan of the wench outfit after I married Ysolda and I got tired of the same outfit so I made a bunch of them. Eventually I will make a mod so that she changes them daily. These are all CBBE v2 Short Sleeve. I have Included eight colors: light blue, frost, lavender, purple, seafoam, white and short transparent.  These can also be used standalone as they include the meshes but the Wench Outfit boot texture is required for the boots to show up black.  

Archmage Robe Nocturnal Collection
As requested I have made a pack of twelve colors to choose from for the Archmage robes.  Colors include: Tru Blue, White, Aqua, Black and White, Burgundy and Gold, Emerald, Frost Mage, Goth Black, Pink, Purple and Gold, Red, and Starry night Wizard.  These can also be used standalone as they include the meshes but the Wench Outfit boot texture is required for the boots to show up black.  

Change Log:
1.7 Added Ashara Wedding Dress, Maquerade Jester Outfit, Black Archmage Boots and Gloves and bug fixes, CBBE Dragon Scale Bunny Armor
1.6 Added Underwear Armors and Triss Armor Collection
1.5 Added Barmaid-Farmer outfits
1.4 Added Shiny Purple Corset Shroud Armor
1.31 Added Wench Boots to Barkeep Outfits for compatibility.
1.3 Bug Fixes: Created dedicated texture files for all the Mage Robes, Nocturnal Outfits, Wench Outfits, and Ysolda Pack.  Overwriting the original textures was causing problems with other items and icons in the game that shared the same textures.   Old texture files must be removed for this to work.  High res textures from other mods will have no effect as long as they are intended from the original meshes.  I recommend a complete reinstall (which is easy with NMM)
1.2 Added Barmaid and Barmaid Variant
1.1 Added CBBE Skimpy versions of the Tavern-Wench outfit for the Main Tavern and Ysolda file into the main download

Modding Notes:
* I am using wench boots for every nocturnal outfit except the wedding dress for a reason. Many of the original boots will clip badly or even make the feet disappear when used with Nocturnal robes.
* I tried using the Eisen mod (not as a replacer)but the armors are not upgradable so the stats are not so good. Using them as a replacer allows them to be effective as well as good looking.
* Note that in many cases, like the Forsworn Outfit, the male and female meshes share the same textures so the Male and Female outfits must be matching.
* I am getting away from Oblivion imports due to bugs and NPC clipping and incompatinility.  I will rerelease them later as a separate mods with an esp

Credits:
